articles.title: Audit: K-12 school department failed to investigate 22 child abuse reports
articles.description:

summary: Audit reveals Boston K-12 school department ignored 22 child abuse reports.

articles.title: Red Sox fall to A’s 5-4; Chapman’s hitless streak ends at 50 batters, 17 appearances
articles.description:
Nick Kurtz joined Jose Canseco and Mark McGwire as the only Athletics rookies to hit 30 home runs and Lawrence Butler hit a ninth-inning walk-off single in a 5-4 win over the Boston Red Sox and Aroldis Chapman, whose seven-week hitless streak ended

summary: Red Sox lost 5-4 to the Athletics on September 10, 2025.
Aroldis Chapman ended a 50-batter hitless streak over 17 appearances.
Lawrence Butler's walk-off single impacts Red Sox playoff hopes.

articles.title: Charlie Kirk, right-wing provocateur and close ally of Trump, dies at 31
